column1: This is the only cream that gives me the deep penetrating hydration my skin needs. My forehead was peeling from the dryness caused by winter weather. Regular nightly use finally has it beginning to heal.

used this since they started making it. every time I try something else my skin notices. I can only use Olay without getting dry spots or red spots.. I just stay with Olay and its a lot cheaper than fancy stores [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Love this! It makes my skin the softest it's ever been.A lovely ,silk like texture and smoothing effect. I don't know how it works but I get results and that's all I care about other than the fact that it's fragrance free. Thanks Olay :)
Feels so nice, soft light fragrance and stays on all night. My face is very hydrated in the morning. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
this amazing night cream is excellent for all skin types, you awaken with a vibrant glow, and more refind , smooth , youthful looking skin [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
I've been using Olay products for too many years to count. This product is perfect for night time use and keeps my aging skin looking young. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have been using olay since I was in my 30's, I am 63 and have very few wrinkles. People are shocked at my age! I feel it's due to no sun, no smoking and olay everyday! I am a believer in this product.
Must use nightly to keep aging skin at it's best!

I use this faithfully every night! Its not greasy or sticky and smoothes over your face very nicely. When I wake in the morning my skin doesn't feel dry or like I slept with grease on my face all night like some overnight moisturizers do. Great product! I am a diehard Olay consumer! I get great results from every product I've tried. My only wish is that Olay would give more instructed regimens, like what product to use when and which one goes over top of another. That would be VERY helpful on this website!!!!!

I use the Regenerist Night Recovery Moisturizing Treatment with Olay Regenerist Daily Serum every night and I have seen a real improvement in my skin's texture and appearance. My friends have even complimented me on how good my skin looks and ask me what I have been using. It took several weeks of consistent use, but these two products have really made a difference for me.

I have used this Night Cream for about 1 year and never miss a night of applying. When I started, I had crow's feet around the eyes and puffy eyes till noontime every day. Now , my skin is very supple, no crow's feet showing and my eyes are not puffy most days when I wake up. I will continue indefinitely buying this cream. I also use the Olay regenerist day cream and will continue.

I am 58 years old and I have been using Oil of Olay products for years. I do not look my age and I do contribute Oil of Olay for helping my skin look younger. I just started using this product and I love it and will continue to use it as long as possible. I have tried manye expensive products and always gone back to Olay. Keep up the good work.

I've been addicted to Regenerist Night Recover for a couple of years. My neck is starting to show my age and this cream smooths the skin, making the crepiness almost disappear. I use it both morning and night. It's my stranded-on-a-desert-island pick, along with sunscreen. :-)

I WAS A MAKEUP ARTIST, LONG AGO. I HAVE USED MENY PRODUCTS IN MY LIFE. I WAS A FLIGHT ATTENDANT FOR 34 YR. YOU KNOW HOW DRYING THE ALTITUDE CAN BE ON YOUR SKIN. ESPECIALY ON INTERNATIONAL FLIGHTS. REGENERIST NIGHT MOISTURIZING IS THE BEST PRODUCT I HAVE EVER USED!!!! I TELL ALL MY FRIENDS ABOUT IT. IT MAKES MY SKIN FEEL SO SOFT AND CLEAN. I ALSO LIKE THE SMELL OF YOUR PRODUCT.

This is the best night cream ever! It smells wonderful!! I saw a huge improvement when I used this. I swear by it. I will never use anything else. I used to pay 2x the price of this for other facial creams and due to a tough economy I have had to cut back. I wish I had know how great this was years ago! My skin has less wrinkles and my rosacea has calmed down so much that I feel comfortable not wearing make up...on the weekend, during the day.
I've been using this cream for a couple months now. Its light, non greasy, no perfumes. Kind of luxurious. Very hydrating. I recommend.
I bought this few weeks ago and I really like it. It provides immediate improvements in terms of soft and relaxed skin.
Love this cream. I have used others by Olay Regenerist and this is the best by far. I will definitely purchase this again.

This was not at all what I ordered, it was whipped and it sounds like it is sunblock lotion. I don't even see how you could mix up the lavender color night cream with the dark red whipped container. Very disappointed

I have used several of the Olay products but this is my favorite. It glides on like silk and smells fabulous. My skin feels smoother and less dry since using the Regenerist Night Recovery Moisturizer.

This used to be my favorite until they repackaged it and raised the price by nearly $10. they also must have changed the formula as it now is not easily absorbed and doesn't firm near as good. I will no longer be buying this item. Also, not shipped in 2 days as per walmart.com free shipping policy.
Still waiting for the wonderful moisture to my skin.
Good price, fast shipping!

Finished my old jar of night cream, bought new jar, opened it up to find a totally different cream. Not the lavender, sweet smelling, somewhat thick formula I had loved (and in my opinion worked miracles!) This new cream is white, sort of thin and did not work the same at all...Returned very next day and bought the night of olay. So disappointed.....

I've been using the night recovery cream for a little over 3 weeks and I dont know how I went so long without! It leaves my otherwise oily skin, soft and smooth each morning. It's worked wonders on my acne prone skin. I now use this religiously along with the eye serum, microderm/peel system 2xweek, serum 2x week (after each peel), and the Olay Protective Renewal Lotion with BHC and SPF (daily). All together, this skin regimen has cleared and softened my skin. Thank you Olay!

This is the best moisturizer I have ever tried. I use this day and night. It leaves my skin silky soft and never greasy or heavy feeling. I also apply this to my hands and elbows when they are dry, works wonders. Best all purpose cream I have ever used. I would recommend this to all age groups.

I have been using Oil of Olay since I was 24yrs. old. Everyone tells me what beautiful facial skin I have. No one belives I am my age, I get guessed 10 - 20 yrs. younger than I am. I have been using Oil of Olay Regenerist since it came out on the market, I love Oil of Olay and will continue to use it for the rest of my life. Thank you oil of Olay!

this is the best night cream I've ever used. I've been using it now for many years and love it. I've tried other brands of night creams, but this one makes your face feel, young, refreshed and lifted each day. It's a must for all women. A pick-me-up in a jar. It goes on smooth and easy and if there is one product you must have and use every night, make it this one.
It is rejuvenating to your skin and neck. Plus well worth the effort to keep your face young and plump.
I have trouble with skin allergies. Love the fragrance free aspect of this product. I have very dry skin and like the texture and moisturizer.
Great moisturizer that is well priced, non greasy and makes my skin feel great in the morning.
I've been using olay for years and never been let down
I've tried so many skin creams and lotion, this is the only one that deeply moisturizers and doesn't cause acne. I highly recommend this product.
LOVE THIS! After the 1st use i could feel the difference. i use it every other night...worth every penny!
I love this product and I've used it for years. I love the way it plumps up your skin and gives you a smooth feel and overall younger-looking skin
So nice to feel on my face. Will not change product.i Fall in Love with this cream.
Great moisturizer; leaves my skin feeling soft and supple.
I have always loved this product It is better than the department store brands.

I have tried many different expensive night time face treatments. Regenerist night cream out performs them all. It really is the best, when I wake up my skin looks great. I am so please with this product.

I had been using the original formula for many years. It used to leave a very nice soft, velvety feeling on your skin and felt really moisturized. The new white cream is very irritating to my skin, does not feel moisturized and the perfume is very strong.

I am so disappointed that you have changed the formula for the Night Recovery Cream. This has been my FAVORITE product for many years with a silky feeling on my face with the delicious scent of the lavender cream. Now it is a sticky white thick mess. Please, please return the old product to our store shelves! Like another writer, I also get compliments on my skin and I recommend this cream to many people. No more.

I have used this product for many years and was very happy with it. I was very disappointed when I bought my last jar and it seemed like a totally different product. New color, texture, smell. It is heavy and sits on my face. In the morning I can rub it off my face. I don't like the smell of the new product either. Why did you change a great product?!

I have used this product for years and was extremely happy with the results from using it, even receiving compliments on my skin from strangers, which should have told me something I was doing was right. But I was lured away from my favorite by a fancy sales hype, and switched formulas. Boy was I disappointed! Now I'm back to the night cream and I have my "good" skin back. I'll never stray again! Great product! Keep making it!!

I had been looking for a night cream that would moisturise my very dry, aging and sensitive skin. This has proven to be a wonderful product, my skin feels silky in the mornings and I do not see all the 'dry' lines on my face. The only reason I gave this 4 and not 5 stars is that I find the fragrance to be a bit over powering and would love to see this introduced either as less fragrant or fragrance free.

I started using Regenerist about 5 weeks ago, and from the 1st time I used it I loved it. The texture, smell and they way it makes my skin feel both at night and when I wake up in the morning, is great. My skin is oily, with large pores and prone to acne breakouts. I've noticed in the past couple of days that my pores are so much smaller. My skin is so smooth and soft. I will continue to use the product and recommend it to anyone who asks.

This night cream is okay, not great. It's not greasy nor is it tacky(sticky), and it's certainly not oily. However, I find it to leave my manly facial skin a bit on dry side. It's not hydrating as one might think or as Olay claims it it be and it cost too much. I stop using it.

Finally a product that does exactly what I wanted it to!! I had some fine lines on my forehead and they are gone after using this product! I have tried everything from La Mer to expensive dept. store moisturizers and they didn't work. This really works! The ads do not lie! Thank you thank you Olay! Never phase out this product from your line.

This is the best product I have ever used. I wake up and my skin is so clear and glowing that makeup is not needed. I am 38 and often mistaken for in my twenties. I work in the medical field and have access to high end skin care but choose olay instead.

This is by far the best night cream I have ever used. I too, due to the tough economy, have had to cut back, and decided to give this product a try. I could not be more pleasantly surprised! I should have known though; my mother was an Olay woman, and always had beautiful skin - thanks Olay, for such a great product, at an affordable price!

I've used your Regenerist Night Recovery Moisturizing Treatment a short while ago. (I ran out and need MORE, ) But while I used it, my face?, my skin?, felt great! BOTH, at night while putting it ON. THEN waking up to nice, refreshed, smooth, HAPPY skin!! Your products really DO what they SAY they'll do! Thanks!! Sincerely, Kittykat1961 =^..^=

I have used a lot of night creams in my adult life. This cream is absolutely the best one I have ever used . I put it on at night and can feel the difference as I am applying . In the morning I wake up with my skin feeling as though I had just applied it. It is terrific!! Unique and does work!

I am on my second jar of Regenerist Night Recovery Moisturing Treatment, as endorsed by InStyle magazine as the preferred night cream. I can see a difference in my skin texture whenever I forget to apply it before bedtime, and I can't imagine switching to any other product when I am crazy about this one!

I hate to admit it but I am getting older, but this product makes it easier to accept. I love the look of my face when I get up in the morning. I don't know about the mini face lift, but I do know my face does look rejuvenated and youthful each morning. Two-thumbs up for it.

This night treatment is so moisturizing! I am a product junkie - I try all kinds of skincare products - but this is the one nighttime moisturizer that really makes my skin feel GREAT the entire next day! An esthetician told me during a facial recently that my skin was dehydrated... her $40 cream didn't help. I tried Regenerist Night Recovery Moisturizing Treatment and voila! My skin feels and looks amazing!!
Moisturizes well and skin feels very smooth in the morning.
I have been using very expensive night cream. Decided to give this a try. Love it!
Love that this is fragrance free for night time use.
I love how my face feels after I apply this moisturizer at night, and even the next day my face feels very hydrated. I can totally tell the difference when I use it!

I didn't think a cream could get much better than the Regenerist Daily Serum, but this night cream is fantastic. Really soaks right into the skin and has a non greasy, refreshing feel to it. Love this.
I use this night cream,just for 2 weeks now ,but i saw really amazing improvement! i feel glow and firming my skin ,specialy around the eyes! i feel so good!thanx!olay!
I like this product, moisturizes my skin and my skin feels a lot smoother and fresher when i wake up. Then i use the regenerating serum during the day. Works well together for me.

I loved this night cream and used it religiously for year. I told all my friends about it. Suddenly I could only find the fragrance free. Not only is the wonderful scent gone, the cream is now tacky like glue, not creamy and moisturizing like it has been. I'm so, so sad!

I just bought this night cream primarily because it is fragrance free. I CANNOT use anything with fragrance. I am thrilled with it so far. Not sticky or greasy. Great feel, absorbs instantly and my skin feels so soft. I've tried over 30 products with no success because I can't use them long enough to see if the results last. I am hoping I can continue to use this. So far so good but it's only been a few days. But getting this far is a miracle!

I have an extreme sinus allergy to scented products. There are so few fragrance-free products that I definitely knew I needed to try this. It's only been a few days but so far so good! I need more time to determine if it fulfills it's promises before I give it all 5 stars. I will be trying one of your daytime moisturizers, too. Do you have one to suggest? I am in the sun a lot.

I don't care so much about fragrance (though it was lovely), however, the product IS different. It feels greasy and sticky now and my face feels suffocated. It feels as though it is sitting on top of my skin instead of soaking in. I see the responses to similar reviews, suggesting no change was made to the formula, but clearly your long-time customers know better. Since Olay doesn't want to address the issue in any real way, it's time to find something else that actually works.

It is a must I use fragrance free due to skin sensitivity. I just purchased today. Wasn't sure what to expect...Put it on before bed. My face FEELS AMAZING! The product is very silky and smooth. I'm not sure what people are talking about when they say “it's sticky feeling”.only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because it's only first day using.

I'm echoing the reviews of those of you who loved the lavender smell and the smoother, lighter feel of that product. I've written to Olay twice now in the last year hoping that with all of the obvious dissatisfaction with the new product, they would offer the superior lavender scented product once more. I've been hoarding jars of the original formula and am now down to my last one. I also am searching for a alternative. Olay - please listen!!

This is my first use of an olayfacial product and I don't find it sticky, or heavy, etc. It,s rather pleasant. My skin feels better...gotta wait a wee bit longer for disappearing wrinkles. I never used their other product so I can't compare. My guess is, the old product isn't coming back.

I have been using the night recovery and the eye lifting serum for 10+ years. Preferred it over high end products but since changing the formula (and the price point) I am now looking for something else. Please bring back the old formulations of these two products. I'll even pay the steeper price point if the old formula was used. :'(

I can only use fragrance free products, so thanks Olay for offering this cream. I usually use the Micro Sculpting FF cream, but decided to give this a try because it was on sale. I actually like it better than the Micro Sculpting FF cream. It glides on and I saw a difference in just one use. I'd recommend this and will buy it again.

I previously used the regenerist night cream. Lovely, silky, absorbed quickly, didn't irritate my skin, pleasant fragrance and made a noticeable difference. The new formula texture is sticky to fingers, doesn't apply well and feels sticky even after rubbing in and leaving for ten minutes. I will be returning this disappointing product. Olay, you had a lovely product. I wish you'd bring it back.

Please bring back the old formula! I really loved this product. As soon as I ran out, I went to pick some more up but it was a newer version and it honestly did not feel the same it was heavier on the skin and did not have the silky feeling the old product did. They have lost my business for now hopefully they will bring back the old formula.

I recently went back to using Olay Regenerist products and used to love the night recovery cream. I know they claim they didn't change the formula but this stuff is nothing like the old cream. I have to use a lot more of it and it does not feel like it really absorbs into my skin at all. I will not buy this again unless they change it back. Also the old smell was great, bring it back please.

This blue jar with black lid night cream is wonderful. Here's the problem. I did mot receive this night cream. I received the new version with the silver lid, which is the new version of the old cream. For 25% of women it causes breakouts. Misery, I loved the old cream as did many others. I like Walmart delivery and the app is great. They should update the only me image for this product. Yes, I'm returning the merchandise. The process is easy so thanks for this part Walmart.

Works just fine. At first I did not read that it shouldn't be anywhere near the eyes, so the first two nights of application I suffered. It has a smooth, slick kind of feeling to touch but I do not notice anything happening to my fine lines on my forehead. I have oily, sensitive skin so the fragrance free is great for me.

why would olay take the fragrance out of the product? I miss the soothing scent. i've bought the new fragrance-free version, but i really miss the old formula. I'm getting old - aren't we all - but my skin feels drier than with the old formula. I'm supplementing with hyaluronic acid. I'd be less critical if I had that scent to fall to sleep to.

I've been using this product for over twenty years and whenever I try something else I always come back to it. My fair sensitive skin responds so well to this night cream - nourished, uplifted, and like a mini facial. Really love this product. During the winter I use it during the day sometimes to get extra moisture and benefits.

Loyal Olay user for decades and had to buy your new night cream. Several issues: it doesn't go on as smoothly and it no longer has that light wonderful scent, it now costs almost 3x more than the previous product this replaced, AND I noticed facial dryness in the morning and there is no more of the smooth soft skin I was accustomed to having after a week of using this new product...I'm also noticing my wrinkles, pores, and uneven skin tone more, ughhhh so disappointed!

I had used the original formula for years and LOVED it. It was soft and silky, non sticky, hydrating. It smelled awesome to boot! This new formula is absolutely awful and none of the above! I couldn't even finish the jar. I no longer buy this product. Really wish they would bring back the original. I've seen the Olay responses to all these negative comments and very disappointed.

This new stuff is thick, greasy and unpleasant, unlike the original purple product. You can copy and paste the same response to all these dis-satisfied customers, but it doesn't change the fact that you ruined a great product. I'm sure this is reflected in your sales numbers. The product feels totally different and for every one dis-satisfied customer who took the time to post a response, there are probably a thousand who didn't, who feel the same way. BRING BACK THE OLAY WE KNOW AND LOVE!

I like the old product better, when it was lavender color and had a light scent. However, this seems to work almost as well. I am 61 years old and am just now getting little lines around my eyes. Even my dermatologist said my skin looks amazing and asked what I used. I will be a lifelong user of this night cream. I have tried lots of other creams and moisturizers but nothing works as well as this one. Thanks Olay.

I completely agree, the original product was so good! I loved this product and had used it for a long time. But whatever changes they have made, have not Been for the better. I've been using a different product and will continue until they change it back

I have very dry & sensitive skin. I've been using this cream for 3 weeks. I love it. I apply it b4 bed & in the morning. The dry patches on my face have gone away. My skin is softer now. My powder & concelour glide onto my face when before it would look flaky. I have found this products works great for me in the day time as well. I apply it 1st then follow up with Olay Complete sensitive skin w SPF. Does Olay have a day cream that is just as good as this night cream? If so, please do recommend.

I don't like the new product. Bring back the original. This new product feels thick and doesn't have the same consistency. It also does not work nearly as well as the previous product. Never understand why a company would take an outstanding product out of production and throw something on the shelves thinking people will continue to buy it just because it has the same name. Very disappointed in Olay. Please, bring back the previous product! I won't be buying this one for sure.

I don't like the new product. Bring back the original. This new product feels thick and doesn't have the same consistency. It also does not work nearly as well as the previous product. Never understand why a company would take an outstanding product out of production and throw something on the shelves thinking people will continue to buy it just because it has the same name. Very disappointed in Olay. Please, bring back the previous product! I won't be buying this one for sure.

Please bring back the frangrance! It was a 5 star product before. It was such a subtle scent and I loved how it smelled and made me look forward to a good night's sleep. I've looked everywhere for the scented product and finally had to buy the fragrance-free version. It is not the same and doesn't feel as silky on my skin. You had a winner of a product before the change. Now I have to find another night time product as I don't like this one as much.

This product is amazing because it does what it promises. After using this product I wake up with my skin feeling moisturized and hydrated. I am definitely "hooked" I am using the "fragrance free" night cream which I totally appreciate. Oil of Olay does it again!!! Thanks "Oil of Olay".

I MISS THE FRAGRANCE!!!!!!!!!!!! You keep saying all you did was remove the fragrance but in doing so it changed the silkiness of the product. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE bring back the old product. Total Effects is NOT the same. Why do companies insist on ruining a good thing......seems to me you were selling the product or you wouldnt have so many unhappy customers writing reviews.

I liked the old version of this product - it was the perfect night cream. It was absorbed into your skin without leaving a greasy feeling. You woke up to great skin feeling fresh. Please add the old product back to the other wonderful line of Olay products. Thank you.

I loved this product for many years! I have rather oily skin, so the silky, non-greasy touch of this product used to be just perfect. It moistured the skin without evoking greasy skin. This new formula feels like pure grease on the skin and does not apply as well as the old formula. I am forced to move on from Olay.

I used this product after using the Olay Pro-X Microdermabrasion + Advanced Cleansing System, 4 pc I purchased at the same time. Thought the cleansing system made May face smooth and clean feeling; this was the cherry on the sundae! I can feel the difference in the texture and my skin looks quenched and feels amazing. Today was the first time my face didn't "feel" or looked exhausted. It had a softness look about it. It did not look or feel oily, but healthy! I would recommend trying this overnight cream.

I've used this products for years now..I love it...when people hear that I am 59 they say...no way...or that it's hard to believe..they usually guess I'm in my 40's...sure genetics has something to do with it, but so does using the oil of Olay eye and regenerist products does too....I love the way it feels on my cleansed skin at night...luxurious feel!!

I have been using this product for years. The new formula is much less creamy and has a very unpleasant smell. I always buy fragrance-free but the new formula definitely does not smell good. And the texture and feel is sticky. I normally would rub my fingers over my hands when I am done applying it to my face. Now I am washing my hands. My skin feels dry and tight. Sorry Olay - think it is time to switch brands after so many wonderful years of being happy with your product.

Satin-y feel, not greasy. Went on smoothly and had no fragrance or smell. It did not make me break out or clog my pores. I live in the desert where hydration is a must, and thought this was just as good as the pricier ones. For my skin though, I still prefer the regular Frangrance-free Regenerist micro-sculpting cream at night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Olay always offer a good product, I never had any issues and is my go-to drugstore brand. I used the Regenerist night recovery cream. No discernable smell, not heavy, went on velvety smooth, very natural feeling on my skin, as if I had nothing on. I also used a slightly more expensive night cream on alternating nights and didn't really noticed much of a difference with the Regenerist night recovery cream. I would recommend this product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This Olay product did not disappoint. It felt velvety and very smooth on my skin and I look forward to putting it on every night after washing my face. It provided the exact right amount of moisture. Great product! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love olay regenerist creams. Unfortunately, I can never find the night time cream. My question is can you use the daytime at night? Couldn't get an answer. Best product I've found. Doesn't make my skin break out. My wrinkles disappeared. Dang coupon expired. I ended up buying the daytime. I'm going to try at night.

This product does what is says it will and more. My skin looks and feels healthier and younger. I am amazed at the difference and improvement. It only took two days before I began to see results from this product. Thank you Olay! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I needed a night Cream to supplement my day time Olay seven layer moisturizer. The Night Recovery cream has a nice light scent and was non greasy. It went on so easily and seem to just melt into my skin. Some wrinkle creams leave my skin itchy as they work. But this cream had no side effects and it make a big improvement with the first week. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product sounds like perfection. Love peptides and moisture! Good for sensitive skin because it is fragrance free. I have sensitive, dry skin and this goes on so smoothly and feels amazing at night. Have not used it long enough to notice any skin improvement. Did wake up with drier than normal skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love almost every Olay product I've tried, but I think this one is my favorite! This night cream is velvety, not oily, which is perfect for my skin. And it's fragrance-free! I've only been using it for a few weeks and I love the results! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love the feel of my skin while using this product! It is so much softer and I notice less fine lines and my wrinkles seem smaller! I'm still using it so the jar goes a long way too! My skin feels very hydrated and that's important during the winter especially. It never feels greasy either. I really recommend it! [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Was pleasantly surprised at the size of the 'sample' jar - regular size!

Feels good going on. I was already using an Olay Regenerist Night cream, but I can tell a small difference in my neck area (I have only been using this for a little over a week.) Just sorry that the MSRP shown on the web site is so high; it may prevent me from buying in the future. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

Thank you so much for the sample. I love the silky feel of the product and, even though I usually have trouble with dry spots in the winter time, I have not had one dry spot since I started using the product. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product is great for combination skin. It doesn't feel heavy. Very minute smell to the product. There wasn't any irritation around my eyes or other sensitive skin on my fact. I would highly recommend this product. I just wish the price was less. Good buy. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I am 69 years old and have used Olay products since I was a teenager. I constantly am told by friends and strangers alike that I have beautiful skin. The consistency of this product is wonderful. It goes on so smoothly and does not leave a greasy feeling. I also like the fact that there is no overpowering fragrance. I would not hesitate to buy this product again. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I love this product! I'm so glad glad I got this as a free gift. This night cream is amazing. It goes on so smooth, and because it's so creamy you don't need to use that much. I love putting it on after washing my face before I go to bed..I actually look forward to using it! I highly recommend this. I'm 59 years old and I feel my face already looks better after two weeks of using it. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

From the moment I put this moisturizer on my skin, my face felt so smooth and hydrated. I love the feel of this moisturizer. My skin doesn't feel greasy either. I would recommend this product to anyone and everyone. I know I will continue using this product each night. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

This product, like all Olay creams, feels good to the skin. NOT greasy, which is a plus. I prefer the natural smell, not perfumed. Only complaint is the cost. Would like to see all Olay products at lesser costs. However, Olay has been my product since 1970, so will not change. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]

I have used Olay products in the past (especially regenerist) and have been impressed. It had been a while since I have used Olay and was pleased to try a new product but, while I like everything about the feel and smell of the product I haven't noticed any change in my skin. [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
